entry.title: $2500 // Apartment has ^^^ good size living room with natural light
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 22567
2 Bed / 1 Bath in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Willoughby Avs, Myrtle Av. Living in brand new building, steps to everything you needed. Apartment has good size living room with natural light. All bedrooms are equal size, come with windows and closet. One room has balcony. Building has furnished roof with Manhattan view. Good deal! Please text to setup the viewing. Listed price is net effective.

AMENITIES
Central A/C
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Elevator
Natural Light in Living Area
Laundry in building
Bike storage
Wheelchair Accessible
Outdoor Space
Roof access
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Balcony

entry.title: $2700 // Lofty 2BR/2BA + Private Balcony!
entry.content: Lofty 2BR/2BA unit with Private Balcony available! The tenant is breaking the lease and the lease ends on June 30th, with option of renewal. and separate living room with windows on both sides of the living area. in Prime Bushwick. M train (Knickerbocker Ave) and L train (Dekalb Ave) are near by. Also J train (Kosciuszko St.) Sun-filled Unit, Central AC, Pets friendly, Laundry room in the building. Schedule for a showing!

entry.title: $2425 // Modern finishes apt -+-+ Spacious kitchen living room
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 20430
2 Bed / 2 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Central Av, Jefferson St. Super spacious real 2br 2full bath apt - Spacious kitchen living room combo - 2 decent sized bedrooms on opposite ends of the apt, each with closet and window - Modern finishes throughout - Dual Ac and heating systems - Unit also has shared yard - Mins away from Jefferson L station

AMENITIES
Exposed Brick
Hardwood Floors
Eat In Kitchen
Outdoor Space
Shared backyard
